38202620.review:
Note: I did not buy the 18+ patch. I just played the vanilla Steam version.

This was pretty good but if you're talking about cute catgirl VNs, it has to be compared to Nekopara. For the same price, Nekopara is longer and has better art and animation so if you haven't read that yet, I have to recommend it over Neko-nin. 

If you've already read all of the Nekopara volumes, though, and you need more catgirls in your life (don't we all) then, yeah, I can certainly recommend Neko-nin. It's about a 4 hour read with two options in the middle that offer some changes in dialog for the following scene but don't change anything major so it's basically a kinetic novel. The story is very basic but the girls are cute and that's all that really matters.

冲着画和あじ秋刀魚（玉）而来。

作为一款售价2000日元的小品级萌拔，流程较短，剧情基本为零（漩涡社催眠神功名不虚传），但毕竟还是保住了萌拔的核心战斗力：画（妹子）够好看，cv够悦耳。所以本作不会给人留下深刻印象，但作为闲暇时间（尤其对忙碌社畜而言）的放松治愈之作，还是值得一试的。

个人评分：7/10

34997155.review:
[h1]  测评这gal之前，先说一下这个制作商吧	[/h1]
whirlpool（简称漩涡社），漩涡社是inferno公司计划、制作和销售游戏而办的。fanatic成立于2006年[spoiler] （跟柚子社同年的）
 [/spoiler]，主要是制作AVG类型的废萌游戏，画师是水镜老师和Tenmaso老师担当原画[spoiler]（柚子社画师主要就是小舞一和梦璃凛了）[/spoiler]
再加上每年都会出一两个作的高产（10年和12年甚至出了四作啊）[strike]（隔壁烂柚子都是有时候两年才出一作）[/strike]


OK说正事，关于猫忍之心，剧情马马虎虎吧有点废萌过头但是OP继承了以往的漩涡风格，容量和文本量也不算多，可攻略人数也是二人啊啊啊好想要有彩彩子线啊（还有我跟你讲，简直就是拔作大小嘛）。如果是跟以往的漩涡社作品对比的话，这作我会毫不犹豫的选择低分。最近才出的初情[spoiler]（对没错，就是被万拔镜怼下去的那个，一同受伤的还有激昂）[/spoiler]跟猫忍比的话，毫不犹豫的初情会获胜的吧？[strike]（我永远喜欢超天才魔女☆冥堂羽月）[/strike]

33498923.review:
Pros

+ Character personalization, art style, voice acting, and overall game engine quality are all good

Cons

- NEKO-NIN is not a complete chapter of a visual novel unlike the NEKOPARA games. 
- The problems that are presented in the beginning of the novel are NOT addressed by the end of the visual novel unlike the NEKOPARA games. 
- The visual novel does NOT satisfy the reader unlike the NEKOPARA games.
- The visual effects do not compare to those in NEKOPARA.

Recommendation

Do yourself a favor and compare the sheer number of positive reviews between NEKOPARA and NEKO-NIN before you buy NEKO-NIN. If you buy both, the differences will be obvious. But you should just skip NEKO-NIN.

33454434.review:
漩涡社版艹猫，什么时候搬些旧作品啊。这样就有艹鲸艹神艹树艹吸血鬼了
那个nin的口癖真心听着尴尬，喵不喵nia不nia的
漩涡社也有动态立绘辣~只动耳朵

       [b]以下是我作为评测的感想[/b]
[h1]剧情&人设[/h1]
现在认真想想，剧情就是俩猫耳萌妹子贴上男主，整体挺甜的，废萌嘛，还不错。漩涡社卖人设，比这个中二的人设导致的剧情一大把，袭击肯定是被测验这套路也早已深入人心。但如果作为单纯的没有废萌加成的gal的话，槽点也是大大的有，不喜勿看。[spoiler]这个人设强行放大X倍就不好了吧，还把最尴尬的地方放大了。“那个nin的口癖真心听着尴尬”，以前几作至少没有放大的这么明显，有些作品一些特殊的人设还藏着最后才跟你说，这一作关于人设在剧情表现的部分真的不行[/spoiler]
[h1]画风&视觉体验[/h1]
画风明显不是过去的那两套脸，虽然水镜脸在新作《初情スプリンクル》[strike]（嗯~这次是发情魔女）[/strike]中的脸开始变的没那么“熟悉”了，但这个游戏画师明显不是水镜，貌似加强了YU-RIS引擎，还有动态耳朵立绘。[b]但是还是有祖传优点：CG啊！！！每一步都超漂亮超养眼的！！！[/b]
[h1]声音[/h1]
bgm祖传的好听，cv除了nin听起来也是能让人融化，[b]重点是！！！OP不再催眠辣！！！！！[/b]之前艹鲸的OP直接把我看的睡着了……
[h1]系统[/h1]
紧急回避模式不行啊，连最小化都不如以前，都不能最小化到托盘
[h1]语言[/h1]
漩涡社第一次官中想想就激动

[spoiler]PS:虽然我说了那么多，搞得好像我是漩涡社厨，但其实我是F社厨#(滑稽)[/spoiler]

[h1][b]Whirlpool 初のSteam進出作品[/b][/h1]
[url=https://whirlpool.co.jp/worldelection/]ワールド・エレクション[/url]や[url=https://whirlpool.co.jp/tearstilla/]鯨神のティアスティラ[/url]でお馴染みWhirlpool。
今作はそのWhirlpoolのミニプロジェクト作品となります。
鷹乃ゆき (原画) × 近江谷宥 (シナリオ)のニンニンな萌え系作品。
Steamでは成人向けコンテンツを除いてSekai Projectが販売を担当。
日本国外向けユーザー対象の販売の為、日本語UIは存在しません。
(R-18パッチはDenpasoftの販売なので勿論日本では買えません、無念。)

[h1][b]私から見たこの作品のレビュー[/b][/h1]
「ねこパラのパクり？」って言う人もいるかもしれないが待った。
この作品はあくまでシリーズものではないので、単品で満足できる。
そして、シナリオも[spoiler]ぶっ飛んでるので[/spoiler]新鮮な気持ちで楽しめる。
自分はこの作品は可愛さ推しの作品と捉えてるので、
何よりキャラが可愛いんだよ、耳が動くんだよ、もう最高だよ。
しかしながら日本語非対応、うーん惜しい。我慢して英語を読むべし。
[spoiler] (日本語版とファイルを丸ごと入れ替えしてもSteamから起動出来るんだなぁ) [/spoiler]


[h1][b]Steamオーバーレイ非対応について[/b][/h1]
これはもうゲームエンジン上どうしようもないのかも。
YU-RISエンジンって結構古いエンジンなので致し方ない。
スクリーンショット(以下SS)もブロードキャストも出来ないのは悲しいね。
SSをSteamプロフで飾りたい人は[url=http://steamcommunity.com/app/407310/discussions/0/1319961868324649223/]スレッド[/url]を見るべし。


個人的評価
　システム　　4.5/10
　ストーリー　7.5/10
　コスト　　　9.0/10
　１８禁要素　8.0/10

　総合評価：　安かったら買い ( 29.0/40 )

31754792.review:
A short and cute visual novel about ninja catgirls. It’s mostly kinetic, and there’s only two times where you get to chose one of the options. That won’t change the incoming of the story, it only unlocks two CGs related to the two girls.

Speaking of them, Tama and Yura are very cute! The art style fits the story perfectly and the VA is great. I liked that only their ears “twitch”, for some reason I found that charming, lol. [spoiler]Their elder sister, Nachi, is also a nice character and I found myself wanting to know more about her. I just wished that the other demi-humans had sprites as well.[/spoiler]

I played the censored version here on Steam, but there’s a patch that gives you extra R18 scenes. It’s on the website Denpasoft, and you have to pay for it.

8/10. I recommend this visual novel if you want to read something heartwarming and not too complex. Hopefully there will be a sequel someday.

31552326.review:
Alright, so this is my second attempt at making a review about this game. Why is it my second? Well, the first one was basically me ranting and insulting everyone who played or even stood up against me and spoiling some segments of the game itself, for that I apologise to whoever read it and commented on it. But regardless here it is.

Pros :

Cute- If you really love cute maybe underaged girls then go for it. (Yes I am aware this is Japan we are talking about)

Nekos- Pretty much says it by itself. (Although get Nekopara since there is more variety

Art (Backgrounds & Music)- It was pretty good in all honesty, I was really expecting it to have no music in it at all, however it did and it really does blend it with the tone, enviroment and the mood of the on-going story. However its almost only half the time for me. 

Cons : (My fav ;3)

Story- Pretty average, doesn't really make any sense sometimes. Its almost like when you watch a Michael Bay film except its with cute catgirls and Shia or Matt Damon were a teenage boy,

Sounds that the girls make-  Well this wouldn't really annoy everyone until it happens again and again. I get it that their cats and their supposed to be cat-like. But lets agree for a second that having a annoying sound constantly repeating itself again and again in your earbuds or headphones pretty much gets annoying overtime. 

Final Result :

I give this a 3/10. Thats all, but if you want to purchase it maybe wait for a steam sale? Or just get it with its normal price tag. Although you could by IMHW for even cheaper price but hey, thats just my opinion. And to my friend who bought me this game. Yes, I will give you another horrid game title, probably one about Sonic since you like him so much. And I am still giving this game thumbsdown. Thats all.

31477765.review:
本人一直比较懒，所以就做一个简单的测评好了。
NEKO-NIN exHeart作为不同于nekopara系列的猫忍系列，在剧情方面有了一种创新，不再是悠闲的开店日常，而是加入了战斗的元素[spoiler]（毕竟fps游戏）[/spoiler]。也就是说，从nekopara的水無嘉祥单纯的照顾猫娘们，到了本作的猫娘们用生命去回应主人[spoiler]（My Lord或者说欧尼酱）[/spoiler]。
从整个故事的结局来看，出续作大概是一种趋向，期待下一部作品吧。
优点1：增设了简单的选项，根据个人爱好选择偏爱的对象
优点2：这个其实根本就不算是个优点，但我还是要说，按[b]SPACE+F12[/b]可截高清壁纸
但相比于已经制作成熟的NEKOWORKS,本作还有些美中不足，以下纯属个人意见：
[i]在动畫CG鉴赏方面，nekopara采用了动态画面，而本作还停留在静态，按照某玩家的话说，就是[h1]不  够  真  实[/h1]。当然，我们还是要抱有一颗宽容[spoiler]欧派[/spoiler]的心去体验这部作品。[/i]
最后，给准备入坑的玩家一个[strike]小提示[/strike]：[spoiler]玩游戏遇到选项时请记得顺手[b]存档[/b]，方便你更快的达成CG100%[/spoiler]。
最后乱入一句，恭喜[h1]nekopara vol.3[/h1]发行，坐等[h1]nekopara OVA $100 limited EDITION[/h1]到货

31442857.review:
I'm kinda biased towards Nekopara but this is still one of the most sugoi kawaii desu ne games I have ever seen. If you're done with Nekopara but still want to fap to Nekos, look no further.

The art and voices are good, and so far the story seems... interesting. It's about this guy, right, and 2 ninja catgirls just kinda show up at his house one day saying that he is their master. They start following him to school and stuff, so then, he basically kicks them out, m'kay, and says he doesn't need them, and then they're sad, and then he feels bad, and I'm assuming they're gonna bang, but I'm not that far yet.

Honestly I think the story was designed to be cute and the game is more about the kawaii nekos than the story. There seems to be a lot of filler which only exists for more oppai viewing time and kawaii voices. There aren't as many jokes or innuendos as Nekopara (at least so far), but you can get the 18+ patch so there will be plenty of, ah, adult content, later on.

Anyway, is it as good as Nekopara? No. Worth 10 bucks? Probably. An overall enjoyable experience? Yes (at least for me). Therefore my conclusion is: If you haven't played Nekopara yet, do that first, but once you've finished, go for it.

Upcoming steam trading cards.
Adult patch sold separately at denpasoft website.



Cons: 

No steam achievements.
Expect some frame lag if you are using a potato pc.



Conclusion.

Highly recommended. A good job well done from Sekai Project.

31352320.review:
好吧，毕竟我是玩GALGAME了很久的人，所以首先我想要给在我之前玩这个游戏的人做一个科普。。。。首先是关于这个游戏公司的科普。Whirlpool公司，说到这个公司，经常玩GALGAME的人应该知道，我们都叫它漩涡社。当年出道作的《世界树与恋爱的魔法使》在中国风靡一时。是一个很出色的游戏。
漩涡社的特点，就是基本上12年来，一年一个游戏，而且除了两个游戏，都是有一个非人生物可以攻略。可谓艹非人生物的开山鼻祖，剧情以轻魔幻的校园恋爱而在我们这些恋爱有游戏爱好者这之间十分有名。如果要说他是在抄袭艹猫，从资历上来说，所有的艹非人生物的游戏都是抄袭漩涡社。。不过，具体有没有抄袭，懒得管。反正游戏只要好玩就好了。
漩涡社最大的特点：一是世界观一般都特别大，大到自己都没法自圆其说，这雅士漩涡社一贯以来的缺点；二，漩涡社的画面永远走在GALGAME的的前几名，好比之前漩涡社的艹鲸鱼《鯨神のティアスティラ》，那个背景简直漂亮到没话说。三，就是漩涡社的音乐做的很棒，也许说他的音乐单独听并没有那么好听，但是在整个游戏的舞台上，这个音乐也特别的棒。四是漩涡社的人物设定一直很大胆。让我每次都是特想玩。然后特失望。毕竟漩涡社有一个特点，就是喜欢把日常部分写的很长，然后高潮部分一笔带过。所谓的抓不住要领的剧本。
就我个人来说，漩涡社最没法看的剧本就是《77 ～And，two stars meet again～》以及《契约之吻与真红之瞳》，个人比较看好的《MagusTale 世界树与恋爱的魔法使》以及《龙翼的旋律（竜翼のメロディア）》还有就是10周年的纪念作品的《ワールド・エレクション》按照顺序来说，就是，艹外星人，艹吸血鬼，艹树木和精灵，艹歌声，艹机器人+兽人+魔族+天使
我个人最喜欢的角色就是漩涡社的扫把，对的，艹扫把《まじかりっく⇔スカイハイ ～空飛ぶホウキに想いをのせて～》这个扫把我个人觉得比那个游戏所有的女主都要刻画的好，而且还要性格表现力也更好。为毛这货只是个配角，，，要是跟《千恋万花》一样，搞成主角搞个大新闻。。。我觉得会不错啊喂。所以才销量不好哦，策划大人。
看到这个游戏那两只猫忍者特喜欢吊屋顶上，让我想到漩涡社一贯的特别喜欢事一定过三这个特点。之前漩涡社的那个《Justy×Nasty ～魔王はじめました～》里面华哥演绎的女一号，每次进男主房间都是打碎男主房间的玻璃然后从窗户进去。三次之后男主换上了防弹玻璃，然后一如既往地被打碎了。。。。整个游戏女一号只要来见男主就在不停地打碎男主的玻璃（心疼男主一秒）所有的漩涡社特有的剧情特色。我很喜欢。
漩涡社剩下的几个游戏也是还算值得去玩玩的《うそつき王子と悩めるお姫さま -Princess syndrome-》、还有《G.I.B》、《ねこ☆こい！～猫神さまとネコミミのたたり～》（这个游戏出的非常的早）《舞風のメルト》、《涼風のメルト》简单来说，艹王子、艹魔王、艹外星人（兔耳）、艹猫、艹土地神
这个游戏我已经通关了日文原版，毕竟网上有下而且我日文比英文好一些。怎么说呢，个人感觉这么短的剧情不像是漩涡社啊。。。。估计在一定程度上打算用在中国已经成功过的艹猫，看看中国市场到底怎么样吧。但是不管怎么说，这个故事很有漩涡社自己的特点。还是很不错的，漩涡社一贯的轻魔幻校园恋爱剧。个人看来还是某种意义上挺值得玩的，，话说真便宜。。。。您老能出长一点么，，，我出几百也愿意啊，毕竟漩涡粉。。。。
其实关于这作猫忍，我还是有挺多可以吐槽的，漩涡社的御用画师，这作里面一个都没出现。。。比如说てんまそ、水鏡まみず、而且SD原画也不是こもわた遙華。

话说忍者猫之一居然是高森奈津美，我说您老是不是在千恋万花配音了一个忍者配上瘾了，，，最让我吃惊的是前田惠，，，秋刀鱼大姐，您老不是喜欢配音重口猎奇推理拔作的么。。。。。虽然偶尔会来配音一下纯爱，比如说我翻译的《FRIEND TO LOVER》里面的理奈（我老婆不许抢）。上次音泉的声优广播要你画一个很特别的H的体位，，你画的一个男的在自己撸然后天上掉下来一个妹子合体。。。。。嘛，，，只能说你是猎奇配多了。。。顺便说一句，秋刀鱼的声音我很喜欢，虽然鼻音有点重。。。
怎么说呢，这作就当做一个小小的拔作（漩涡社你居然出拔作）日常卖萌加上偶尔有点小战斗，剧情也不长。话说我这里安装包都有1.5GB为毛STEAM上才1.0GB。。玩了才知道删除了H部分。这几位CV都是老牌了，至少不管怎么说，这几个可是比NEKOPARA的声优要大牌的声优。至少配音上不会让你们失望的。

31350864.review:
Neko-Nin is a short yet decent Visual Novel. It is about two sisters who are cat demi-humans, who show up on the main character Haruki's doorstep proclaiming that they are Shinobi from the Fuuma village born to serve him. They are Yura(Older Sister) and Tama(Younger Sister) Fuuma. At first reluctant Haruki ends up taking the two sisters in gradually growing closer to them as time passes. 
               The story, while short, is good and has quite a bit of humor. It should be noted there are only two choices in it. The music is decent and the graphics are good as well. The voice acting is also done well. I personally give the Visual Novel a 9/10.

31321976.review:
Just finished my first playthrough of the game; as you can perhaps tell, it's not a particularly long game, though that is to be expected from its price. I also bought the H-Patch from the Denpasoft website and yes, I did play through all the H-scenes on my route. Now, onto the review. No spoilers, I promise.

This game is nothing special, Visual Novel wise, but sometimes that's exactly what you're looking for. It certainly was what I was looking for, coming into this. People have been comparing this to NekoPara and personally, while I liked NekoPara better, Neko Nin is still pretty good. It's got a very light and fluffy storyline, filled with the heartwarming, cute and funny tropes you tend to expect from this kind of thing. The H-scenes came often and sometimes out of the blue, but hey, you're not playing this for plot, are you? For a VN, this is pretty quality art, and I especially loved that the catgirls' ears twitch randomly when you talk to them. This is a Visual Novel as opposed to a Kinetic Novel, so there are choices to make, but I get the feeling that the choices just unlock different H-scenes.


As I said above, you should not be playing this for plot. You're playing this for something light and cute, with stupidly adorable scenes, a few tongue-in-cheek jokes, and the warmth of two somewhat ditzy catgirl ninjas. The main character is almost stupidly stereotypical, and what passes for story is basically just a set-up to introduce two potential future heroines (if the game ever gets a sequel) and an excuse to make you feel warm and fuzzy. This isn't bad, mind you, but there are times where the game went a little over-the-top. It's not just that plot wasn't really coherent; it's also that all the pieces of a super typical romcom anime were tossed together and stirred, but not quite completely.

Still, I'd recommend this game to anyone who wants to pass a little time in good, happy, but not quite wholesome fun. It's definitely worth playing for its price, and it definitely helped feed my neverending need for Visual Novels. Just don't go in expecting some soul-gripping, heart-moving, teary-eyed epic, and you'll be set.

Pros:
-Great art
-Cute and fluffy storyline
-H-Scenes galore
-Nekos
-Nins
-Can be played with one hand

Cons:
-Super stereotypical MC
-Super stereotypical plot set up
-No seriousness at all
-Can't H-scene all the girls, please gib sequel
-Tissues not included
